amendment.description: To strike the time limitation for certain appeals.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3945 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3945 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 3911. (consideration: CR S537; text: CR S537) To strike the time limitation for certain appeals.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3945 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Bond to Amendment SA 3911.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3945 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
